Event.Message: Possible disk corruption detected for executable image %1, causing application %2 to stop working with exception %3, status code %4. Initiating further diagnostics.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CorruptedFilePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CrashedAppName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExceptionCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ExceptionStatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Possible heap corruption detected (exception code %1). Initiating further diagnostics.
Possible crash in an unloaded dll detected. Initiating further diagnostics.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ModuleNameLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ModuleNameLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Crash on launch is detected. Initiating further diagnostics.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcessId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ModuleName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StartTime" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="CrashTimeFromStart" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>
